dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: Well, Bishop Nomah, I'll be off.

dialogue.speaker: Nomah
dialogue.line: Celica... Must you go? The road to Mila's Temple is long. Between Geyse's pirates and the evil fiends rising, you'll surely be attacked. It's too risky...

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: But Father, it's been three years since we last grew crops. What in the world befell the Earth Goddess Mila? I want to find out for myself.

dialogue.speaker: Nomah
dialogue.line: I see... If you insist, then I shall not stop you, Celica. You know why Sir Mycen placed you in my care, right? You are the last of the Zofian royal family. Zofia's people depend on you. Don't try to do the impossible.

dialogue.speaker: Mycen
dialogue.line: Celica, it's been a while, eh?

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: ...? Grandfather! Why are you here?!

dialogue.speaker: Mycen
dialogue.line: Well, for many reasons... I see you've arrived safely.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: Yes, thanks to my allies. We're all going to Mila's Temple.

dialogue.speaker: Mycen
dialogue.line: I see... Well, you might want to head upstairs first. You should find someone you've been wishing to meet.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: It...it can't be! ...Alm? Zofia's liberator couldn't be Alm... could it?

dialogue.speaker: Mycen
dialogue.line: Well, why don't you go see?

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: ...? You are... Ce...Celica!

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: Alm... So it really was you. I haven't seen you since I left the village...

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: Yeah. We always used to play together. I held a serious grudge against Gramps the day you were sent away.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: I was sad too, but Grandfather told me why he did it: 'If you stay in Ram, Desaix will come to kill you.'

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: But why? Why would Desaix want to kill you, Celica?

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: That... I'm sorry. I'd rather not say right now. In any case, Alm, I have a request. Can war be avoided with the Kingdom of Rigel?

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: That's impossible. King Rudolf of Rigel decided to attack while Zofia is weak. At this rate, Zofia will be destroyed.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: But aren't we all the same? We should be able to coexist.

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: There's no way. Zofians won't tolerate Rigel's barbaric rule. We must retaliate!

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: How sad... I'm sure if we talked, we could come to an understanding... Unless, Alm, now that the Zofians call you their hero, you want to become their king as well?

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: What! That's mean, Celica. I just want to protect the people of Zofia, that's all. Besides, Zofia's only remaining princess is still alive. I'm planning to search for her. After I find her, I'm returning to Ram.

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: That's not true! Zofia's royal family is gone! But I get it, Alm. You go ahead to Rigel. My companions and I are going to Mila's Temple.

dialogue.speaker: Alm
dialogue.line: Celica!?

dialogue.speaker: Celica
dialogue.line: Goodbye, Alm...

conversation.speaker: Nomah
conversation.line: May the blessings of Mila be with you...

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: It's said a powerful sword is hidden at the Seabound Shrine.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Don't go near the Seabound Shrine, 'kay? A scary Necrodragon lives on that island and eats all trespassers.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: If you want to sail to Valentia, take that docked ship. However, lots of pirates trawl the waters. Their boss, Barth, has killed many people.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Earlier, some men left to avenge their families. They probably won't return alive.

conversation.speaker: Palla
conversation.line: We came from Archanea, a continent to the east.

conversation.speaker: Catria
conversation.line: Our little sister was taken by pirates. We gave chase, but lost them around here.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: A hero has arrived in Zofia! We're saved!

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: You'd better not go to Mila's Temple. That area's crawling with Geyse's bandits.

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Hurrah! Zofia Castle is liberated! Desaix fled to his own lands!

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Sure, I'm happy... But I'm a bit worried that the Kingdom of Rigel might invade...

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Desaix's gone, but crops are wilting and weird demons emerged... What's happened to the Earth Goddess Mila?

conversation.speaker: Npc
conversation.line: Desaix escaped with the valuable 'Royal Sword'. It was a gift of friendship from the Kingdom of Rigel long ago. No normal person can use it.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Mae
recruit-conversation.line: That Boey's just a kid who only knows Fire magic. I can also use Thunder, so please rely on me, 'kay?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Boey
recruit-conversation.line: You must feel uneasy with just the girls, right? I'll come along too, so please relax.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Genny
recruit-conversation.line: If Lady Celica is going, then I shall go too. If you get hurt, I can heal you with my Recover spell.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Saber
recruit-conversation.line: Oh, shaddaaap! Dun interrupt my drinkin'! Don't gooo... Y'all can't cross the sea by yerselves, can ya?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Celica
recruit-conversation.line: Aren't you a mercenary? Could you protect us?

recruit-conversation.speaker: Saber
recruit-conversation.line: What? You wanna hire me? Hmm... Alright, it might be interestin'.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Valbar
recruit-conversation.line: You helped us out there. I owe ya one! Wherever ya go, I'll follow!

recruit-conversation.speaker: Kamui
recruit-conversation.line: Me? Well, I can join y'all if you like. ...Unless you're gonna fight the Necrodragon. There's no way to defeat that thing without Angel magic.

recruit-conversation.speaker: Leon
recruit-conversation.line: If my bro Valbar's going, then I am too. I'll show you my marksmanship!

battle.speaker: Valbar
battle.line: Kamui, Leon, don't slip up! If Barth is defeated, his goons should flee. Bring down Barth!

boss.speaker: Barth
boss.line: You've got nerve attackin' me, the pirate lord Barth! I'll dice ya!
